articles.title: Bruins dominate Flames 4-1 to start homestand, Calgary loses 4th straight
articles.description:
Sean Kuraly had a goal and an assist, Tanner Jeannot had two assists, and the Boston Bruins started a five-game homestand with a 4-1 win over the Calgary Flames
